channel.title: Need help! :( [delta]
channel.description:
if i click on my lunar altar i get this error
Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOu at client.method36(client.java:1539) at client.method102(client.java:7687) at client.method9(client.java:8567) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4376) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
does anyone have or know a client that supports lunar magics?
thank you :P
